amendment.description: To include as an additional right or privilege of commissioned officers of the Public Health Service (and their beneficiaries) certain leave provided under title 10, United States Code, to commissioned officers of the Army (or their beneficiaries).

vote.text: Amendment SA 3156 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3156 proposed by Senator Wicker for Senator Duckworth to Amendment SA 3748. To include as an additional right or privilege of commissioned officers of the Public Health Service (and their beneficiaries) certain leave provided under title 10, United States Code, to commissioned officers of the Army (or their beneficiaries).
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3156 proposed by Senator Wicker for Senator Duckworth to Amendment SA 3748.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3156 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
